CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 4, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "New Departure - Something new was featured at the fashion show at Brown Chapel Church last Friday by the Senior Choir. Boys and girls donned the raiment of altar boys and nuns, respectively. Top photo [lower photo], left to right: Walter Butler, James Dandridge, David Jordan, Melvin Campbell, William Dandridge, James Herbert, Freddie Lewis and Robert LaMar... Lealie Walton's orchestra and the Bradford Majorettes were also featured. - Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Boys wearing altar boy attire, from left: Walter Butler, James Dandridge, David Jordan, Melvin Campbell, William Dandridge, James Herbert, Freddie Lewis, and Robert LaMar, posed in Brown Chapel Church for fashion show
CatSubject_tab: Children--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Costumes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Pittsburgh, Pa)
